description: This ontology partially describes the built-in classes and properties that together form the basis of the RDF/XML syntax of OWL 2. The content of this ontology is based on Tables 6.1 and 6.2 in Section 6.4 of the OWL 2 RDF-Based Semantics specification, available at http://www.w3.org/TR/owl2-rdf-based-semantics/. Please note that those tables do not include the different annotations (labels, comments and rdfs:isDefinedBy links) used in this file. Also note that the descriptions provided in this ontology do not provide a complete and correct formal description of either the syntax or the semantics of the introduced terms (please see the OWL 2 recommendations for the complete and normative specifications). Furthermore, the information provided by this ontology may be misleading if not used with care. This ontology SHOULD NOT be imported into OWL ontologies. Importing this file into an OWL 2 DL ontology will cause it to become an OWL 2 Full ontology and may have other, unexpected, consequences.
label: The OWL 2 Schema vocabulary (OWL 2)

AllDifferent.description: The class of collections of pairwise different individuals.
AllDifferent.label: AllDifferent

AllDisjointClasses.description: The class of collections of pairwise disjoint classes.
AllDisjointClasses.label: AllDisjointClasses

AllDisjointProperties.description: The class of collections of pairwise disjoint properties.
AllDisjointProperties.label: AllDisjointProperties

Annotation.description: The class of annotated annotations for which the RDF serialization consists of an annotated subject, predicate and object.
Annotation.label: Annotation

Axiom.description: The class of annotated axioms for which the RDF serialization consists of an annotated subject, predicate and object.
Axiom.label: Axiom

DataRange.description: The class of OWL data ranges, which are special kinds of datatypes. Note: The use of the IRI owl:DataRange has been deprecated as of OWL 2. The IRI rdfs:Datatype SHOULD be used instead.
DataRange.label: DataRange

NegativePropertyAssertion.description: The class of negative property assertions.
NegativePropertyAssertion.label: NegativePropertyAssertion

backwardCompatibleWith.description: The annotation property that indicates that a given ontology is backward compatible with another ontology.
backwardCompatibleWith.label: backwardCompatibleWith

deprecated.description: The annotation property that indicates that a given entity has been deprecated.
deprecated.label: deprecated

incompatibleWith.description: The annotation property that indicates that a given ontology is incompatible with another ontology.
incompatibleWith.label: incompatibleWith

priorVersion.description: The annotation property that indicates the predecessor ontology of a given ontology.
priorVersion.label: priorVersion

versionInfo.description: The annotation property that provides version information for an ontology or another OWL construct.
versionInfo.label: versionInfo

allValuesFrom.description: The property that determines the class that a universal property restriction refers to.
allValuesFrom.label: allValuesFrom

annotatedProperty.description: The property that determines the predicate of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
annotatedProperty.label: annotatedProperty

annotatedSource.description: The property that determines the subject of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
annotatedSource.label: annotatedSource

annotatedTarget.description: The property that determines the object of an annotated axiom or annotated annotation.
annotatedTarget.label: annotatedTarget

assertionProperty.description: The property that determines the predicate of a negative property assertion.
assertionProperty.label: assertionProperty

cardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of an exact cardinality restriction.
cardinality.label: cardinality

complementOf.description: The property that determines that a given class is the complement of another class.
complementOf.label: complementOf

datatypeComplementOf.description: The property that determines that a given data range is the complement of another data range with respect to the data domain.
datatypeComplementOf.label: datatypeComplementOf

differentFrom.description: The property that determines that two given individuals are different.
differentFrom.label: differentFrom

disjointUnionOf.description: The property that determines that a given class is equivalent to the disjoint union of a collection of other classes.
disjointUnionOf.label: disjointUnionOf

disjointWith.description: The property that determines that two given classes are disjoint.
disjointWith.label: disjointWith

distinctMembers.description: The property that determines the collection of pairwise different individuals in a owl:AllDifferent axiom.
distinctMembers.label: distinctMembers

equivalentClass.description: The property that determines that two given classes are equivalent, and that is used to specify datatype definitions.
equivalentClass.label: equivalentClass

equivalentProperty.description: The property that determines that two given properties are equivalent.
equivalentProperty.label: equivalentProperty

hasKey.description: The property that determines the collection of properties that jointly build a key.
hasKey.label: hasKey

hasSelf.description: The property that determines the property that a self restriction refers to.
hasSelf.label: hasSelf

hasValue.description: The property that determines the individual that a has-value restriction refers to.
hasValue.label: hasValue

intersectionOf.description: The property that determines the collection of classes or data ranges that build an intersection.
intersectionOf.label: intersectionOf

inverseOf.description: The property that determines that two given properties are inverse.
inverseOf.label: inverseOf

maxCardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of a maximum cardinality restriction.
maxCardinality.label: maxCardinality

maxQualifiedCardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of a maximum qualified cardinality restriction.
maxQualifiedCardinality.label: maxQualifiedCardinality

members.description: The property that determines the collection of members in either a owl:AllDifferent, owl:AllDisjointClasses or owl:AllDisjointProperties axiom.
members.label: members

minCardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of a minimum cardinality restriction.
minCardinality.label: minCardinality

minQualifiedCardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of a minimum qualified cardinality restriction.
minQualifiedCardinality.label: minQualifiedCardinality

onClass.description: The property that determines the class that a qualified object cardinality restriction refers to.
onClass.label: onClass

onDataRange.description: The property that determines the data range that a qualified data cardinality restriction refers to.
onDataRange.label: onDataRange

onDatatype.description: The property that determines the datatype that a datatype restriction refers to.
onDatatype.label: onDatatype

onProperties.description: The property that determines the n-tuple of properties that a property restriction on an n-ary data range refers to.
onProperties.label: onProperties

onProperty.description: The property that determines the property that a property restriction refers to.
onProperty.label: onProperty

oneOf.description: The property that determines the collection of individuals or data values that build an enumeration.
oneOf.label: oneOf

propertyChainAxiom.description: The property that determines the n-tuple of properties that build a sub property chain of a given property.
propertyChainAxiom.label: propertyChainAxiom

propertyDisjointWith.description: The property that determines that two given properties are disjoint.
propertyDisjointWith.label: propertyDisjointWith

qualifiedCardinality.description: The property that determines the cardinality of an exact qualified cardinality restriction.
qualifiedCardinality.label: qualifiedCardinality

sameAs.description: The property that determines that two given individuals are equal.
sameAs.label: sameAs

someValuesFrom.description: The property that determines the class that an existential property restriction refers to.
someValuesFrom.label: someValuesFrom

sourceIndividual.description: The property that determines the subject of a negative property assertion.
sourceIndividual.label: sourceIndividual

targetIndividual.description: The property that determines the object of a negative object property assertion.
targetIndividual.label: targetIndividual

targetValue.description: The property that determines the value of a negative data property assertion.
targetValue.label: targetValue

unionOf.description: The property that determines the collection of classes or data ranges that build a union.
unionOf.label: unionOf

withRestrictions.description: The property that determines the collection of facet-value pairs that define a datatype restriction.
withRestrictions.label: withRestrictions

bottomObjectProperty.description: The object property that does not relate any two individuals.
bottomObjectProperty.label: bottomObjectProperty

topObjectProperty.description: The object property that relates every two individuals.
topObjectProperty.label: topObjectProperty

bottomDataProperty.description: The data property that does not relate any individual to any data value.
bottomDataProperty.label: bottomDataProperty

topDataProperty.description: The data property that relates every individual to every data value.
topDataProperty.label: topDataProperty

imports.description: The property that is used for importing other ontologies into a given ontology.
imports.label: imports

versionIRI.description: The property that identifies the version IRI of an ontology.
versionIRI.label: versionIRI
